issue.title: [C++] ARROW_DEPENDENCY_SOURCE=CONDA does not work properly with MSVC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4878](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4878). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The prefix must have `\Library` added to it

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4878?focusedCommentId=16793627) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3910
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3910>
